DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the effects of a nutrition supplement for pregnant women on birth weight and other outcomes. The hypothesis is pregnant women who consume a daily fortified food supplement will produce babies with a higher mean birth weight than those who do not.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of a Fortified Dietary Supplement for Pregnant Women on Maternal and Newborn Outcomes in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years of age in first trimester of pregnancy plans to reside in the same village during the entire pregnancy a minor not in first trimester of pregnancy plans to relocate during the pregnancy
